about_the_game:
Flagdashers is your new obsession—a pulse-pounding multiplayer battle game where you'll leap, sprint, and snag the flag in exhilarating 1v1 or 3v3 showdowns. Pick your hero from Team Black or Team Gray, each bursting with cuteness and armed with unique powers like explosive arrows and playful tricks. Outwit your opponents and be the first team to win 3 out of 5 rounds for the glory. Created by a band of friends dedicated to leveling up multiplayer fun, Flagdashers promises high-energy gameplay with a delightful twist. Dive in and let the flag-dashing frenzy begin!


This is not pay-to-win

The team is committed to not introducing abilities or cosmetics that can be unlocked with purchases and offer players an in-game advantage.

Capture the Flag to win

The flag sits perched on the top-middle platform, daring players to scale its heights and seize it using explosive or teleportation arrows. Grab the flag, and a countdown starts ticking. If the flag bearer is defeated or the timer expires, the flag returns to its starting spot.

Join us on Discord:

name: Flagdashers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, Radeon R7 370 or equivalent with 2 GB of video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 260 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 11
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 960, Radeon RX 570 or equivalent with 4GB of video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Gear up to dash, scale, and snatch the flag, then deliver it to your opponent's base with a mix of charm and explosive arrows. Outwit your rivals and win 3 out of 5 rounds to claim victory!
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
